overview: The world is falling apart, right before our eyes. Do we engage in it's problems? Or do we rather let us fall into the comfy space of ignorance and escapism? An associative music video that ventures into a split consciousness, distorted by radiant surfaces and stranding impressions.  The visuals are curated by the indie-folk band Mount Winslow.
tagline: Would you let yourself sink in?
title: Flokati
